docstring.long_description: This block is used to read data from a CAN Bus connection. A connection to the CAN device must be established using the CAN_CONNECT block.
docstring.short_description: Read data from a CAN Bus connection.

parameters.name: PCAN_address
parameters.description: The CAN device address to connect to.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: The timeout in seconds to wait for a message. Default is 10.

parameters.name: raise_error
parameters.description: If True, an exception will be raised if no data is received. Default is True.
